mapper.insert: insert into lre_server.user_client (client_id, user_id, client_name, client_type, client_OS, client_info, status, create_time) values (#{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{clientOs,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{clientInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update lre_server.user_client set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, client_name = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_type = #{clientType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, client_OS = #{clientOs,jdbcType=TINYINT}, client_info = #{clientInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select client_id, user_id, client_name, client_type, client_OS, client_info, status, create_time from lre_server.user_client where client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select client_id, user_id, client_name, client_type, client_OS, client_info, status, create_time from lre_server.user_client

select client_id, client_name, client_type, client_OS, client_info, status, create_time from lre_server.user_client where user_id = #{userClient.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and client_id like concat('%',#{userClient.clientId},'%')
and client_name like concat('%',#{userClient.clientName},'%')
and status like concat('%',#{userClient.status},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{userClient.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{userClient.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
order by create_time desc
select client_id, client_name, client_type, client_OS, client_info, status, create_time from lre_server.user_client where client_name = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
